radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in shape and contour. There are no focal hepatic lesions. The main portal vein is patent with normal direction of flow. There is a small amount of pneumobilia. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilation. The common bile duct measures 5 mm. No filling defects are identified within the common bile duct. There are multiple large gallstones within the gallbladder. The gallbladder wall is thickened, measuring up to 5 mm. No tense distention, gallbladder wall edema, or pericholecystic fluid. The spleen is normal, measuring 10.7 cm. There is no ascites on this limited upper quadrant ultrasound.
